author: Kamal Ali and Michael J. Pazzani
title: Error Reduction through Learning Multiple Descriptions
window: the efficacy of using multiple models. It is important to analyze these experimental data because the amount of error reduction obtained by using multiple models varies a great deal. On the wine data set, for example, the error obtained by uniformly weighted voting between eleven, stochastically-generated descriptions is only one seventh that of the error obtained by using a single description.
